summary: This is an email from the FBI Victim Services Division inviting a victim of Jeffrey Epstein (identified by case number EFTA00153829) to attend a briefing about available victim services. The briefing was scheduled for October 2019 in either Miramar, Florida, or New York, New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being offered services by the FBI Victim Services Division.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing - Florida
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Miramar, Florida.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing - New York
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York, NY.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in September 2019.
The invitation references an active investigation into Jeffrey Epstein (Case Number: NY-3027571).
Briefings were scheduled in both Florida and New York, indicating victims were located in multiple jurisdictions.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the briefing.
The document is addressed to a specific victim identified by a case file number (EFTA00153829).
